00332 template<class function>
00333         void C4DView::FunctionSlot<function>::createFunction(C4DView *view) {
00334 
00335 #   ifdef USE_AUTO_PTR
00336         view->F.reset
00337 #   else
00338         if (view->F) delete view->F;
00339         view->F =
00340 #endif
00341             (new function (view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00342                            view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du (),
00343                            view->Values->vmin (), view->Values->vmax (), view->Values->dv ()));
00344 
00345     SingletonLog::Instance() << "FunctionSlot<function>::createFunction(): "
00346             << view->F->getFunctionName().toStdString()
00347             << "(" << view->F->getParameterName(0).toStdString()
00348             << "," <<view->F->getParameterName(1).toStdString() <<","
00349             << view->F->getParameterName(2).toStdString() <<","
00350             << view->F->getParameterName(3).toStdString()<<")\n";
00351 
00352     view->menu->updateFunctionMenu (view->F->getFunctionName());
00353     view->AssignValues (view->F);
00354     view->Redraw ();
00355 }
00356 
00362 template<class function>
00363         void C4DView::FunctionSlot<function>::createSurface(C4DView *view) {
00364 
00365 #   ifdef USE_AUTO_PTR
00366     view->F.reset
00367 #   else
00368             if (view->F) delete view->F;
00369     view->F =
00370 #endif
00371             (new function (view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00372              view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du ()));
00373 
00374     if(0) std::cerr << "FunctionSlot<function>::createSurface(): " << view->F->getFunctionName().toStdString()
00375                 << "(" << view->F->getParameterName(0).toStdString() <<","<<view->F->getParameterName(1).toStdString() <<","<<
00376                 view->F->getParameterName(2).toStdString() <<","<< view->F->getParameterName(3).toStdString()<<")"<< std::endl;
00377 
00378     try {
00379         view->menu->updateFunctionMenu (view->F->getFunctionName());
00380     } catch (QString error) {
00381         QMessageBox::information (NULL, "Error", error);
00382 
00383     }
00384     view->AssignValues (view->F);
00385 
00386     view->Redraw ();
00387 }

00402 template<class function>
00403         void C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot<function>::createCustomFunction(C4DView *view) {
00404             function *tmp = new function (
00405                 view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00406                 view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du (),
00407                 view->Values->vmin (), view->Values->vmax (), view->Values->dv ());
00408             if (tmp->isValid()) {
00409 #               ifdef USE_AUTO_PTR
00410                     view->F.reset(tmp);
00411                     QString sym (((function *)(view->F).get ())->symbolic());
00412 #               else
00413                     if (view->F) delete view->F;
00414                     view->F = tmp;
00415                     QString sym (((function *)(view->F))->symbolic());
00416 #               endif
00417 
00418                 view->AssignValues(view->F);
00419                 view->Redraw ();
00420             } else {
00421                 delete tmp;
00422                 view->UpdateStatus("Failed to load custom function");
00423             }
00424         }
00425 
00432 template<class function>
00433         void C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot<function>::createCustomSurface(C4DView *view) {
00434             function *tmp = new function (view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00435                                           view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du ());
00436             if (tmp->isValid()) {
00437 #               ifdef USE_AUTO_PTR
00438                 view->F.reset(tmp);
00439                 QString sym (((function *)(view->F).get ())->symbolic());
00440 #               else
00441                 if (view->F) delete view->F;
00442                 view->F = tmp;
00443                 QString sym (((function *)(view->F))->symbolic());
00444 #               endif
00445 
00446                 view->AssignValues(view->F);
00447                 view->Redraw ();
00448             } else {
00449                 delete tmp;
00450                 view->UpdateStatus("Failed to load custom function");
00451             }
00452         }
